nodes.text: Senthrodys was a terrestrial astronomical object. In the aftermath of the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Senthrodys was targeted during Operation: Cinder, the Galactic Empire's campaign to destroy worlds that both supported and opposed its regime. As part of Operation: Cinder, the Empire used tectonic devices to shatter the crust of Senthrodys.
Senthrodys was mentioned in Alphabet Squadron, a novel written by Alexander Freed and published in 2019.
